Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 6th overall pick, by Detroit in 2016...
Injured on 4/11/2016 with a Bruised Heel, out for 6 days...
Injured on 4/20/2016 with a Strained Groin Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Had first career hit on 6/6/2017, off Dwayne Brewington (MON)...
Hit first career homerun on 6/8/2017, off Arthur Smith (COL)...
Traded from Detroit to St. Louis (C) on 7/25/2017 (Going to DET: CF Carlos Lopez. Going to STL: 1B George Stebbins, C Jason Burr, 3B Mark Wright)...
Injured on 4/15/2019 with a Torn Anterior Cruciate Ligament, out for full season...
Drove in 6 runs against Detroit on 7/27/2019...
Injured on 9/1/2019 with a Pulled Achilles Tendon, out for 9 weeks...
Was selected to the 2020 Allstar game...
Injured on 9/12/2020 with a Pulled Hamstring Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
1/31/2021: Gets a new one-year contract worth $1,864,286 through salary arbitration...
Traded from St. Louis (C) to Cincinnati on 2/13/2021 (Going to CIN: RF Patricio Garza, 1B George Stebbins. Going to STL: P Imotoku Kyoden, P Zachary Pietrzak)...
